bug.author: yushan111
bug.description: We should add docs and update setup that we only support sklearn < 0.23 or we should add sklearn 0.23 support.

comments.comment: Sklearn >= 0.23 will throw errorï¼šRuntimeError: The reset parameter is False but there is no n_features_in_ attribute. Is this estimator fitted? The error message is not clear enough. We should capture the error and prompt to downgrade sklearn.
